Tasks.Task Description: Continuously monitor performance metrics of Azure Blob Storage, including latency and throughput, to ensure optimal operation.

Monitor and analyze costs associated with Azure Blob Storage usage, identifying opportunities for cost optimization.

Tasks.Task: Manage Blob Storage Updates and Patches

Tasks.Task: Review Blob Storage Compliance and Governance

Keep documentation related to Azure Blob Storage operations, configurations, and policies up-to-date.
